header.text: Baby Dev Studio is a unique place for parents, moms  and babies to feel safe, fortified & connected!
We provide both Moms and their babies with resources to enhance  physical, sensory and social development.

intro.text: We are a very special family in house place, who put moms & babies at the center of our attention and care.
Our groups are small and personal.
We offer our services to moms from 7 month pregnant until their babies are walking.
We are a one of a kind place who come from the view of preventative and fun care mixed together.
